title: Clean & Clear Morning Glow Moisturizer, SPF 15, 4 Ounce
description: From the invigorating Morning Burst collection comes Morning Burst Shine Control Moisturizer. The light, gentle formula is infused with an invigorating fragrance that's sure to enliven your senses. It hydrates and refreshes tired, dull skin while providing longlasting shine control.

title: Tourmaline Tools Lite 1043 by Hot Tools Professional 1875 Watt Tourmaline Ionic Professional Hair Dryer
description: Tourmaline Tools Lite by Hot Tools Professional Tourmaline 1875 watt hair dryer with Direct Ion technology and high airflow tourmaline dries hair up to 50% faster. Tourmaline converts heat into penetrating far-infrared energy, drying the cortex (interior) without over-drying the cuticle (exterior). Also helps cleanse hair of odors and impurities. Direct Ion Technology leaves cuticles silky, shiny, softer and less frizzy by breaking water into smaller easier-to-absorb droplets. Newly designed and engineered lightweight motor. Narrow 1-3/4" European nozzle accepts most universal fit diffusers.

title: Emerita Pro-gest Natural Balancing Cream, 2 Ounce
description: It helps women find relief from issues that occur during perimenopause and menopause.

title: Aveeno Nourish + Moisturize Shampoo, 10.5 Ounce
description: Indulge in silky, healthy, more manageable hair. Infused with Hydrating Oat Protein and Nourishing Wheat Complex, this exclusive Active Naturals formula is scientifically proven to nourish dry, damaged hair back to life in just three washes. Cleanses while deeply conditioning for incredible softness and smoothness. Designed to target the areas of your hair where you need moisture the most. Developed by our expert team of scientists and a leading stylist, our Active Naturals formulas harness the power of nature and science for beautifully healthy looking hair. Gentle on color-treated hair.

title: CoverGirl Trublend Minerals Loose Powder,  Translucent Fair 405,  0.63-Ounce
description: Get a natural looking glow in an instant! The natural minerals in COVERGIRL TRUblend Minerals Loose Powder, TRUblend Minerals Blush, and TRUblend Minerals Bronzer give a naturally luminous look for a soft, even-toned, fresh complexion. The shaker-top jar and fluffy application puff make setting your COVERGIRL TRUblend foundation a breeze.
